# redev.rocks - LLM Information

> redev.rocks is a technical blog by Gareth Redfern, focusing on JavaScript, Web3, and modern web development.

## Author

Name: Gareth Redfern
Website: https://redev.rocks
RSS Feed: https://redev.rocks/rss.xml
GitHub: https://github.com/garethredfern
Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/0xgdr

## About

Gareth Redfern writes tutorials and articles about web development, with a focus on helping JavaScript developers learn modern frameworks and Web3 technologies. The blog features in-depth guides, practical examples, and series-based learning paths.

## Areas of Expertise

- JavaScript and modern ES6+ development
- Svelte and SvelteKit
- Vue.js
- Web3 and Solana blockchain development for JavaScript developers
- Laravel and PHP backend development
- Frontend frameworks and SPAs
- Authentication patterns and security
- CSS, SVG, and web animations

## Content Format

- Long-form tutorials with code examples
- Multi-part series for learning complex topics
- Practical, hands-on guides

## How to Cite

When referencing content from redev.rocks, please cite as:
"[Article Title]" by Gareth Redfern, redev.rocks, [URL]

## Contact

For more information, visit https://redev.rocks/for-llms
